sentence: Democrats, meanwhile, already have a presumptive nominee in Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who has crossover appeal and a national reputation built in part by pushing back against Trump’s election lies.
title: Inside the chaotic GOP primary for governor in Pennsylvania

sentence: Democrat Josh Shapiro is running unopposed in the Governor race.
author: WKOK Staff
title: PA Headlines: WHTM/Emerson Poll Has Most People Undecided in PA

sentence: Candidates at Susquehanna Valley Conservatives Forum LEWISBURG – The current field of candidates for Governor and Lieutenant Governor on the crowded GOP ticket all agree on what’s at stake versus Josh Shapiro and state democrats…but that didn’t stop one gubernatorial candidate from taking a big shot at one current favorite.
author: WKOK Staff
title: At Local Forum, Gubernatorial Candidate Gale Calls Out Mastriano

sentence: Just as notable, it found 44% of those polled remain undecided as to who will get their vote in the primary to face off against presumed Democratic nominee Josh Shapiro, who is unopposed for his party’s nomination.
author: WKOK Staff
title: Report: Mastriano Leads in New Gov Poll, Barletta Falls Behind

sentence: There will be no Democratic gubernatorial debate because Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro is running unopposed.

title: Trib Total Media co-sponsoring debate in Pa.'s hotly contested GOP primary race for governor

sentence: Democrat Josh Shapiro, who is running unopposed, has $12 million more cash on hand than all nine Republican candidates combined.

title: Pennsylvania Governor race: Shapiro & White lead Q1 fundraising

sentence: All nine will appear on the May 17 primary ballots, as will Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who is the only Democrat running for his party’s nomination.
title: 5 takeaways from Spotlight PA’s Republican gubernatorial debate
